title: Mist might delay start of racing
content:
Mist might delay the start of Manx Grand Prix racing today. 

		 
That’s the fear of the clerk of the court, Phil Taubman. Be he says the weather forecast suggests it should have stopped raining by the start of today’s schedule. 

Roads will still close as scheduled. 

			 
The current schedule is: 



 
9.30am:  Roads close around the course 

10.15am:   Mylchreest Motors Junior Manx Grand Prix 

1.15pm:  Start of MGP SuperTwin and Lightweight TT 

3.15pm:  Start Senior Practice 

			 
4.15pm:  Roads currently scheduled to open.
